== Mattighatta (612161) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Mattighatta is a village in the [[Tiptur ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 436.8 hectares and harbouring 344 households with total population of 1316 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Tiptur]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 638 and female population is 678. Scheduled Caste Population is 312 and Scheduled Tribes population is 0. Census Location Code of the village is 612161<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
